The name must be a text string.
El nombre debe tener un máximo de 50 car: The name must be a maximum of 50 characters.
Los apellidos deben ser una cadena de te: Last names must be a text string.
Los apellidos deben tener un máximo de 5: Last names must be a maximum of 50 characters.
El Carné de Identidad debe contener exac: The Identity Card must contain exactly 11 characters and only numbers.
El teléfono debe tener 8 números y conte: The phone must have 8 numbers and contain only numbers.
El correo debe tener un formato de corre: The email must be in a valid email format.
El correo debe tener un máximo de 100 ca: The email must have a maximum of 100 characters.
El usuario debe contener solo caracteres: The username must contain only alphanumeric characters.
El usuario debe tener un mínimo de 5 car: The username must be a minimum of 5 characters.
El usuario debe tener un máximo de 20 ca: The username must be a maximum of 20 characters.
La contraseña debe contener exactamente: The password must contain exactly 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one digit, and one special character.
Bienvenido: Welcome to our innovative emotion classification system through face and voice. Here, you will discover powerful tools designed to analyze and understand human emotions with precision and efficiency. Get ready to transform the way you understand and manage emotions!
Explora: Explore our advanced audio recording and photo taking section, designed for accurate emotion classification. Here, users can capture both their voice and facial expressions, providing rich data that allows our system to analyze and determine their emotions with high precision.
Sumérgete: Immerse yourself in this detailed section, where you will find audios and photos already classified ready to be reviewed. Here, users can access their voice recordings and facial captures, allowing a thorough review of previously analyzed emotions.
Revisa: Check out this section where the data collected from your logs is transformed into valuable information. Here, users can access detailed statistical data about their emotions, generated from voice recordings and classified facial captures.
Bienvenido a nuestro proyecto: Welcome to our emotion classification project! This innovative system was developed by a passionate student from the Universidad Central Marta Abreu de Las Villas (UCLV) as part of his final assignment for completing his studies. With dedication and enthusiasm, I create a comprehensive solution to meet the needs of detecting people's emotions through face and voice in any context.
Este proyecto nació: This project was born as part of our academic training at UCLV. Guided by a passion for web programming and problem solving, we set out to create a tool that would simplify emotion detection. Throughout the process, we faced challenges, learned valuable lessons, and ultimately delivered a solution that we hope will be useful to companies in different fields.
En el corazón: At the heart of our project is the desire to facilitate the emotion detection process. We believe in the importance of continuous learning and are committed to contributing to the growth and development of companies through our application.
Lester no solo: Lester not only came up with the concept but also built each component in meticulous detail. From the design to the implementation of all the logic, their dedication and skill transformed an innovative idea into a powerful tool for emotion classification.
